Trade/Device Name(s): PRODIGY Astro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
PRODIGY Astro PRO Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PRODIGY Astro and PRODIGY Astro PRO blood glucose monitoring systems using electrochemical biosensor technology for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Prodigy Astro is for self-testing by individuals at home to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood; Prodigy Astro PRO is intended for multiple-patient use by healthcare professionals in professional settings for monitoring diabetes control, both for use with blood drawn from fingertips, forearm, upper arm, palm, calf or thigh and not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
